definition: to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: The fire was warm, however, and the nursery dimly lit by three night-lights, and presently the sewing lay on Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 炉火暖融融的，育儿室里半明半暗地点着三盏夜灯。

sentences.english: At birth, the baby kangaroo lives in its mother's brood pouch.
sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠自从出生起就一直生活在妈妈的育儿袋里。

sentences.english: They have a special pouch where they carry the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 牠们有特别的育儿袋，袋内装有卵子。

sentences.english: He also said he was proud of his parenting skills.
sentences.chinese: 他也很以他的育儿经为豪。

sentences.english: My wife and I were together 24-7 and parenting knocked us on our asses.
sentences.chinese: 而我与妻全天候守护着，育儿使我们倦极厌尽。

sentences.english: Will they protest people past child bearing years getting married?
sentences.chinese: 他们会禁止那些已经过了育儿年龄的人结婚吗？

sentences.english: The kangaroo mother allowed a peek inside her pouch for this picture.
sentences.chinese: 小袋鼠的母亲允许摄影师拍摄它育儿袋中的小生命。

sentences.english: Such self-reliance is a principal value of Child rearing in middle-class America.
sentences.chinese: 这种自力更生的精神是最重要的育儿观。

sentences.english: The company also offers job sharing, onsite childcare and, in France, pre-first day training.
sentences.chinese: 公司还提供临时工作分担和办公室育儿室等福利待遇。

sentences.english: Shared sleep may be the most controversial part of attachment parenting theories.
sentences.chinese: 分享睡眠是各种亲密育儿理论中最有争议的一点。

sentences.english: Cindy Platt is a parenting specialist who writes at Your Life’s Blueprint
sentences.chinese: 辛蒂普拉特是写你生命的蓝图的育儿专家。

sentences.english: These young mothers are all obsessed with discussing the ideas about child rearing.
sentences.chinese: 这些年轻妈妈们都痴迷于讨论育儿经。

sentences.english: Its belly on a child-care bag.
sentences.chinese: 它的肚子上有一个育儿袋。

sentences.english: Amy Hatkoff is a parenting educator, writer, filmmaker, and advocate.
sentences.chinese: 艾米哈特考夫是育儿教育家，作家，导演和倡导者。

sentences.english: In it is a revealing nursery dialogue between a new toy rabbit and an old skin horse.
sentences.chinese: 其中有一节新兔子玩具和老皮马在育儿室里的对话。

sentences.english: They followed him out of the nursery and along the corridor to the staircase.
sentences.chinese: 他门跟着他走出育儿室，穿过走廊来到楼梯口。

definition: a mom (mother of a young child)
early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
a dad (father of a young child)
head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
